command.description: Opens Directory of a downloaded/uploaded file
command.name: OpenDirectory

colorDefinition.label: Border Color (Focus)
colorDefinition.description: This color is used for the forground color of the stack border when it has focus.

colorDefinition.label: Border Color (No-Focus)
colorDefinition.description: This color is used for the forground color of the stack border when it doesn't have focus.

fontDefinition.label: Tab Font
fontDefinition.description: This font is used to display the part selection tabs.
